page.title: 06ST SERFS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: St Serfs School was opened on April 3rd 1976. It had been built to replace an older building. It is a{Roman {Catholic}School, with children travelling some distance to come to school. It also serves the village of {High Valleyfield}in which it is situated and takes in{Protestant children from there. 60% of the children are Catholic. There are 170 primary children in the school.There are nine classes.Visiting teachers include a drama teacher, a p.e. teacher and three{music teachers,two of which specialise in piano and violin{tuition. The school has one secretary and one classroom auxiliary. All school meals are cooked on the premses.
